message0:
Real Estate %1
SmartHome ID %2
tooltip: A physical property: house, apartment, land with buildings.

message0: Area %1
tooltip: A major subdivision of a property (e.g. main building, annex, garden).

message0:
Floor %1
floor level %2
tooltip: A storey / level within a building.

message0:
Space %1
area (m²) %2
tooltip: A specific room or enclosed area (e.g. kitchen, bedroom, garage).

message0: Zone %1
tooltip: A logical zone spanning one or more spaces (e.g. thermal zone, fire compartment).

message0:
Circuit %1
max points on circuit %2
phase %3
tooltip: An electrical circuit connecting equipment to a distribution board.

message0: Circuit Type %1
tooltip: Classification: lighting, sockets, dedicated, etc.

message0:
Distribution Board %1
distribution board type %2
tooltip: Main or sub distribution panel.

message0:
Protection Device %1
rated current (A) %2
tooltip: Circuit breaker, RCD, fuse, surge protector.

message0:
Wiring Segment %1
cross section (mm²) %2
tooltip: A run of cable between two points.

message0: Electrical Technical Space %1
tooltip: A generic technical space for electrical installation (e.g. GTL, electrical closet).

message0:
Energy Delivery %1
energy provider name %2
current type %3
neutral system %4
contracted power (kVA) %5
tooltip: Root entry point: contractual and physical energy supply to the property.

message0: Energy Meter %1
tooltip: A metering device measuring energy consumption.

message0: Emergency Disconnect %1
tooltip: Emergency or general disconnect device.

message0: Distribution %1
tooltip: An intermediate distribution node (junction box, sub-distribution).

message0:
Equipment %1
power rating (W) %2
tooltip: A physical device: sensor, actuator, appliance, fixture.

message0:
Equipment Type %1
brand %2
model %3
catalog reference %4
tooltip: Classification of equipment by category, brand, model.

tooltip: Light

message0: Heater %1

message0: NF14 Energy Meter %1
tooltip: Energy meter as defined by NF C 14-100 (compteur Enedis/EDF).

message0: NF14 Emergency Disconnect %1
tooltip: General emergency disconnect as defined by NF C 14-100 (AGCP / disjoncteur de branchement).

tooltip: Gaine Technique Logement — mandatory technical enclosure per NF C 15-100.
